location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 5491/45 'Regent of Iraq - suggested visit to India.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 22; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between the Viceroy, the Foreign Office, the Secretary of State for the Government of India, and the HM Ambassador, Baghdad regarding the idea of a visit by the Regent of Iraq to India.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
Viceroy and Governor-General of India in Council
